data.title: Prince's Home and Studio
data.meta_site_name: Paisley Park | Prince's Home and Studio
data.text:
Paisley Park Cinema Presents: Purple Rain

Paisley Park Cinema Presents: Purple Rain in 4k

Come celebrate the 40th Anniversary of Purple Rain by watching the film in Paisley Park!

Doors open at 6:00 pm

Walkthrough tour from 6:00 - 7:00 pm

Film start time: 7:30

Food and Beverages available for purchase

Limited Onsite Parking Available for purchase via ticketing site

This is an 18+ event

View Event →

Celebration 2024

Early Bird Celebration 2024

In honor of the 40th anniversary of Purple Rain, all guests will experience world class music, celebrity panels, exclusive concert footage, multiple activations in downtown Minneapolis and a newly curated Paisley Park Tour.

For the first time ever, we are offering early bird pricing for a limited number of Celebration 2024 tickets! This is your opportunity to get tickets at a reduced rate prior to panelist and performance announcement coming April 18th, at which time ticket prices will be increased. Ticket purchasers will also receive a 20% discount on Store.Prince.com through April 15th!

Preliminary details of each ticket package are below, and more information regarding programming, music performances, talent, panels and more will be released April 18th! Additionally, for the first time this year we will be making Sponsorship Packages available! If you are interested in being a sponsor, please send an email to: sponsorship@paisleypark.com for more information.

* Celebration 2024 is an 18+ event

VIP | $1,200 – Early Bird Special

Included in the VIP Package

· Exclusive Tour of Paisley Park on Thursday or Sunday (New Exhibits)

· VIP Preferred Seating and Sections at Celebration Events (Strictly Enforced)

· VIP Hospitality Lounge in Downtown Minneapolis

· High-Definition Purple Rain Movie Screening

· Concert: The Revolution at First Avenue (TBA) on Friday - VIP Section

· Concert: Morris Day and Special Guests (TBA) on Saturday - VIP Section

· Concert: New Power Generation and Special Guests (TBA)

· Concert: New Artist Showcases

· Celebration 2024 Panel Discussions (TBA)

· VIP Boat Cruise on Lake Minnetonka

· Admission to Celebration Events and Installations in Downtown Minneapolis

· Exclusive Listening Session at Paisley Park (Unreleased Vault Material)

· Exclusive VIP Merchandise

· First Access to All Celebration Merchandise

· Exclusive VIP Lunch on Thursday

· Exclusive Gospel Brunch on Sunday

· Exclusive VIP Panel and Q&A Session

· Exclusive Unreleased Concert Footage

· Musical Performances

· DJ Dance Parties

· Prince Mural Block Party

· MORE TO COME!

General Admission | $600.00 – Early Bird Special

Included in GA Package

· Admission to Celebration Events and Installations in Downtown Minneapolis

· High-Definition Purple Rain Movie Screening

· Concert: The Revolution at First Avenue (TBA) on Friday

· Concert: Morris Day and Special Guests (TBA) on Saturday

· Concert: New Power Generation and Special Guests (TBA)

· Concert: New Artist Showcases

· Celebration 2024 Panel Discussions (TBA)

· Exclusive Unreleased Concert Footage

· Musical Performances

· DJ Dance Parties

· Prince Mural Block Party

· GA Hospitality Lounge in Downtown Minneapolis

· GA Tour at Paisley Park (New Exhibits)

· MORE TO COME!

View Event →

A Night 2 Remember 2024

Please join us on April 21st 2024 as we celebrate the life of Prince Rogers Nelson.

A Day 2 Reflect (open to the public):

10:00 am - the NPG Music Club is open to the public

All are invited to leave a memorial on the fence

You can bring your own - or use one of the flowers and message tags that we will be providing on site.

Peoples Organic Cafe will be on-site all day with food and beverages for purchase.

4:21 pm - Candle Lighting in NPG Music Club

This portion will be livestreamed for those who are unable to join us in person.

A Night 2 Remember (ticketed event):

6:00 pm Doors open for a free flowing walkthrough tour and time to reflect in the heart of Paisley Park.

7:00 pm The Celebration of Life begins in the form of a DJ Dance Party in NPG Music Club with DJ Holtz providing the soundtrack, and Peoples Organic Cafe presenting the menu.

View Event →

Musicology 20th Anniversary

Princes 28th studio album, Musicology, turns 20 on March 27th! The impact that this album had on the industry and the future of music cannot be overstated.

Come join us in celebrating the release of this iconic album on Friday, March 29th with a night of Real Music by Real Musicians, Concert Footage, a DJ Dance Party featuring DJ Lenka Paris, and more!

VIP ticket holders will receive: On-site parking, preferred seating, and an exclusive artifact experience photo opportunity.

GA ticket holders will park at Chanhassen High School and will be shuttled to Paisley Park.

Food and beverages will be available for purchase from People’s Organic Cafe - Prince’s former personal chefs.

View Event →

Diamonds And Pearls Super Deluxe Album Release Party

EVENT DETAILS

Join us for the long-awaited release of Diamonds and Pearls Super Deluxe!

Start with a screening - and end with a party

In their own words: The evening will begin with a panel discussion featuring members of The New Power Generation.

Following the panel discussion will be a screening of the previously unreleased Live at Glam Slam 1/11/92 concert footage.

Exclusive photo opportunity with a Diamonds and Pearls artifact after the purchase of a Diamonds and Pearls box set at the event only.

We will conclude the night with a Dance Party featuring DJ Lenka Paris in the Soundstage.

Food and drinks will be available for purchase from CRAVE.

VIP tickets include on-site parking and preferred seating.

GA ticket holders will catch the shuttle at Chanhassen Highschool (2200 Lyman Blvd, Chanhassen MN, 55317).

View Event →

Paisley Park After Dark: DJ Ray Seville

Join us for a Paisley Park After Dark experience on Saturday, September 30th. In the tradition of the celebrated events hosted by Prince through the years, guests have the opportunity to experience a limited walk-through tour of Paisley Park. Enter the NPG Music Club as DJ Ray Seville spins your favorite Prince music from 7-11 PM. Check out DJ Ray Seville on Instagram or Facebook, and get your tickets to Paisley Park After Dark now!

About the Limited Walk-Through Experience

All guests with a ticket to Paisley Park After Dark will have the opportunity to walk-through select areas of the museum from 6 PM - 7:30 PM. Any guest arriving after 7:30 PM will not have the tour opportunity.

View Event →

Paisley Park After Dark: DJ Bakeshow Baker

Join us for a Paisley Park After Dark experience on Saturday, August 26th.

View Event →

A Night To Remember

We will be honoring Prince’s life and legacy by offering time for reflection, community and celebration. Guests will have the opportunity to dedicate words of reflection in the heart of Paisley Park. This is followed by an exclusive presentation of Prince’s words of wisdom throughout the years. Finally, we will celebrate life through music and dance in the NPG Music Club. Special guest Lenka Paris, personal DJ and friend to Prince, will be providing the soundtrack to the evening.

View Event →

Love 2 The 9s at Paisley Park

You are invited to an evening at Paisley Park you will never forget, Love 2 The 9s. Guests will begin with a limited museum experience tailored specifically for a romantic evening. Following your tour, a three course dinner provided by People’s Organic will be served in the legendary Paisley Park Soundstage. Finally the evening’s entertainment, Love 2 The 9s, is an acoustic exploration of Prince’s genius catalog consisting a band featuring Tommy Barbarella and Julius Collins.

View Event →

RESCHEDULED NPG Jazz: Collins & Barbarella

Paisley Park’s next edition of NPG Jazz will feature two musicians with a rich Prince history, Tommy Barbarella and Julius Collins. The live music series features local jazz artists in the NPG Music Club at Paisley Park.

Barbarella spent years touring the globe as the keyboardist in New Power Generation. Currently, he composes for the MN Orchestra and serves as a music director for St. Joan of Arc in Minneapolis.

Collins was managed by Prince in his band, Black Julius, and was the lead singer and one of the founders of local sensation Greazy Meal. He also performed as lead singer in Dr. Mambo's Combo. Act fast—tickets will not last long.

View Event →

Paisley Park After Dark: DJ Keezy

Join us for a Paisley Park After Dark experience on Saturday, August 20th.

In the tradition of the celebrated events hosted by Prince through the years, experience a limited tour of the Paisley Park Soundstage from 7-8pm then enter the NPG Music Club. DJ Keezy spins your favorite Prince music from 7-11 PM.

View Event →

Paisley Park After Dark: DJ D.I.M.E.

Join us for a Paisley Park After Dark experience on Saturday, July 23rd.

In the tradition of the celebrated events hosted by Prince through the years, experience a limited tour of Paisley Park from 6:30-7:30pm then enter the NPG Music Club as DJ D.I.M.E. spins your favorite Prince music from 7-11 PM.

View Event →

NPG Jazz: Marcus Anderson

You are invited to Paisley Park’s next edition of NPG Jazz, featuring Marcus Anderson. The live music series kicked off in 2021 and features jazz artists in the NPG Music Club. Act fast, because our premium lounge seating and bistro tables will not last long.

View Event →

Black Fashion Week MN: Design of the Times

You are invited to Design of the Times, a Black Fashion Week Minnesota event hosted in the legendary Soundstage at Paisley Park. Join us for a memorable night of fashion, music, and a Q&A panel with a special guest designer, Debbie McGuan. There are two ticket options available, VIP and General Admission.

View Event →

A Night To Remember featuring Liv Warfield

You are invited to A Night To Remember on April 21st in the Paisley Park Soundstage. We will be honoring Prince’s life and legacy by bringing the world class talents of Liv Warfield back to Paisley Park.

View Event →

NPG Jazz: LP Music

You are invited to Paisley Park’s next edition of NPG Jazz, L.P. Music with Eric Leeds and Paul Peterson – featuring Stokley Williams ("Mint Condition") and Billy Carrothers. The live music series kicked off in December and features local jazz artists in the NPG Music Club. The February edition featured Midnight Love to a sold out crowd. Act fast, because our premium lounge seating and bistro tables will not last long.

View Event →

NPG Jazz: Midnight Love

You are invited to the NPG Music Club this February for NPG Jazz, our new live music series. This time, our featured musical act is local jazz band, Midnight Love. Filling the iconic NPG Music Club will be the sounds of a classic tenor sax and trombone frontline, vintage keyboard sounds in a funky, rare-groove setting with a romantic bent. Created by saxophonist Peter Vircks, Midnight Love merges good vibes with romantically themed music as a departure from heady musical challenges. Act fast, because our premium lounge seating and bistro tables will not last long.

View Event →

Paisley Park Cinema Series: Paris Is Burning

Join us in the Paisley Park Soundstage as we continue the Paisley Park Cinema Series with Paris is Burning, the 1990 landmark documentary. This award winning film provides a vibrant snapshot of the 1980s through the eyes of New York City’s African American and Latinx Harlem ballroom scene.

View Event →

NPG Jazz: Collins & Barbarella

You are invited to the NPG Music Club this December for NPG Jazz, our new live music series. To kick things off, we invited Paisley Park favorites, Julius Collins and Tommy Barbarella. As a member of the original incarnation of the New Power Generation, Tommy Barbarella worked closely with Prince for much of the 1990s. Tommy is joined by Julius Collins, the dynamic voice of their wildly popular band, Greazy Meal. They will explore the classic soul music that shaped them and take a deep dive into Prince’s catalog. Act fast, because our premium lounge seating and bistro tables will not last long.

View Event →

Paisley Park Cinema Series: Under The Cherry Moon

Join us in the Paisley Park Soundstage as we resume the Paisley Park Cinema Series with Under the Cherry Moon, Prince’s directorial debut. Celebrating its 35th anniversary this year, this musical comedy-drama follows two con artists in the French Riviera and their attempt to win over a wealthy heiress. Opposite Prince, the film features former member of The Time Jerome Benton, and Kristin Scott Thomas in her feature film debut.

View Event →

Paisley Park Cinema Series: Summer of Soul with special guest Questlove

Join us in the Paisley Park Soundstage as we resume the Paisley Park Cinema Series with Summer of Soul (...Or, When the Revolution Could Not Be Televised). This unforgettable event includes a live Q&A with director and Prince enthusiast, Questlove, a film screening of Summer of Soul on the Paisley Park Soundstage, and a DJ set by Questlove.

View Event →

Duckwrth: Live from Paisley Park

Don’t miss this one-night event to experience Duckwrth’s visionary, feel-good, “electric soul” sound on the legendary Paisley Park stage. With special guests Anthony Dragons and Jordan Ward.

View Event →

Paisley Park After Dark

In the tradition of the celebrated events hosted by Prince through the years, come hear your favorite Prince music from 7-11 pm in the Paisley Park NPG Music Club. Separate ticket required.

View Event →

SOLD OUT | Welcome 2 America: Release Party

There’s nowhere better to celebrate the historic release of Welcome 2 America than at Prince’s Paisley Park. Join us for a screening of Prince's April 28, 2011 performance at the Forum, part of the Welcome 2 America tour's historic "21 Nite Stand" in Los Angeles, followed by a listening party of the album.

View Event →

SOLD OUT | Paisley Park After Dark: The Beautiful Dance Party

You are invited for a dance party and exclusive first look at The Beautiful Collection: an exhibition of over 300 of Prince’s custom shoes.

View Event →
